concept.title: Part VI: Publishing DITA Content
concept.shortdesc: This module introduces the fundamentals of publishing DITA content across multiple output formats. It also covers translation workflows and customization options for publishing.

ul.li: Identify common output formats for DITA documentation.
Explain how DITA supports efficient multi-channel publishing.
Describe how DITA facilitates language translation workflows.
Understand the methods for customizing output formats in DITA.
